title: Update Training Document #3 title and attach the uploaded PDF as a static asset

requirements.text: Update Training Document #3 (id=3) to use the new line-1 title exactly as provided: "Distinction Codex: Unveling the Markers of Authentic Mastery."

quotes: Let's continue, Aura. Training doc#3. (a) line-1: "Distinction Codex: Unveling the Markers of Authentic Mastery."

acceptanceCriteria: Calling getTrainingDocuments() returns a TrainingDocument with id=3 whose title is exactly "Distinction Codex: Unveling the Markers of Authentic Mastery."
Calling getTrainingDocument(3) returns the same updated title

requirements.text: Attach the user-provided Training Document #3 PDF (noted by the user as ~9,546KB) as a publicly served static asset under the frontend /assets/ path, and update Training Document #3 (id=3) to reference that PDF via its documentUrl so the UI link opens the actual PDF file.

quotes: Note: file size @9,546KB. (b) line-2: actual Pdf File to attach or upload! Proceed!

acceptanceCriteria: The Training Document #3 PDF file is present in the deployed frontend static assets (served from /assets/...).
The backend returns Training Document #3 (id=3) documentUrl pointing to that real /assets/...pdf path (not a route that serves index.html).
In the Training Documents section, clicking Training Document #3 line-2 link opens the PDF in a new browser tab (target=_blank) and displays the PDF content (not the SPA).

requirements.text: Ensure the Training Documents UI does not require hard-coded URL overrides for Training Document #3; if a mapping is used (like the existing id=2 mapping), extend/adjust it so Training Document #3 reliably opens the newly attached PDF in a new tab.

quotes: Training doc#3... line-2: actual Pdf File to attach or upload!

acceptanceCriteria: Training Document #3 link resolves to the correct PDF URL via getStaticAssetUrl(...) and opens in a new tab.
No navigation back to the SPA occurs when opening Training Document #3 PDF.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo; only add a migration file if existing stable state must be upgraded.

Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
User-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Building a new admin upload UI for PDFs (unless required to satisfy the static asset attachment requirement).
Changing Training Video content or membership logic unrelated to Training Document #3.
